meanings.definition: A person or thing that makes something more beautiful.
meanings.sent1: The artist was a skilled beautifier of landscapes.
meanings.sent2: She used the beautifier to add color to the painting.
meanings.sent3: The magical beautifier turned the dull garden into a vibrant paradise.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a beautifier, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The beautifier transformed the plain room into a cozy retreat.

meanings.definition: A substance or product used to enhance the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The makeup artist applied the beautifier to the model's skin.
meanings.sent2: The car wax acted as a beautifier, giving the vehicle a glossy finish.
meanings.sent3: The beautifier spray made the flowers sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The beautifier lotion worked like magic, rejuvenating the old furniture.
meanings.sent5: The beautifier powder added a touch of elegance to her look.
